pages.title: Shoodoran
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Kiva (2008, TV show)$(br2)Spawn locations: Birch Forest, Dark Forest, Flower Forest, Forest, Grove, Old Growth Birch Forest, Mushroom Fields$(br2)Chest loot on next page

Chest loot:$(li)3-6 $(l:kiva/items/fuestle)Fuestles$(/l) (24.4%)$(li)4-6 bones, strings, or spider eyes (12.2%)$(li)1 $(l:kiva/items/fuestles#wakeupfuestle)Wake Up Fuestle (Kiva)$(/l) (9.8%)$(li)1 $(l:kiva/items/fuestles#garulufuestle)Garulu Fuestle$(/l) (7.3%)$(li)1 $(l:kiva/items/fuestles#basshaafuestle)Basshaa Fuestle$(/l) (7.3%)$(li)1 $(l:kiva/items/fuestles#doggafuestle)Dogga Fuestle$(/l) (7.3%)$(li)1 $(l:kiva/items/fuestles#sagafuestle)Wake Up Fuestle (Saga)$(/l) (2.4%)$(li)1 $(l:kiva/items/fuestles#darkwakeupfuestle)Wake Up Fuestle (Dark Kiva)$(/l) (2.4%)$(li)1 $(l:kiva/items/fuestles#newwakeupfuestle)Wake Up Fuestle (New Kiva)$(/l) (2.4%)
